body_html:
@ybsave : I'm confused, I thought the issue was filed about GPU memory utilization, while the error you describe now seems orthogonal?

If that is indeed the case, please file a separate issue/stackoverflow question about that so we can keep discussion on this thread focused on the question raised at the beginning (and mentioned in the summary description)
